name: Small World Of Golf
description:
Keep it casual with this single-player offline mini golf game.



There are 18 holes of Small Golf & 18 holes of Mini Golf!

In Small Golf, which is golf on a small scale, you play with 3 clubs, a pitching wedge, a sand wedge, and a putter.

Both Small Golf & Classic Mini Golf have 2 game modes, normal play & par or under.
In the normal play game mode, you need to sink your ball to move on to the next hole, regardless of your score, no surprises there.
In the par or under game mode, you must sink your ball within par to move on to the next hole.

Par or under is much more challenging but both are great fun to play.
